profile.name: Alex Ellis
profile.headline: @openfaas Senior Software Engineer | Cloud Computing & Automation Expert
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a passion for cloud computing and automation tools. Proven track record of delivering scalable solutions using Go, Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @openfaas
description: Developed and maintained multiple OpenFaaS functions for autoscaling and testing timeouts.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable cloud-based solutions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Designed and developed multiple web applications using Go, Python, and JavaScript.
Provided technical support for clients' projects, including troubleshooting and optimization.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple open-source repositories using TypeScript and Python.
Contributed to the development of new features and bug fixes.

experience.title: Go Long: Testing Functions for Autoscaling
description: Developed a Go-based function for testing timeouts and auto-scaling using OpenFaaS.

experience.title: Alexellis.io: Personal Website
description: Built a personal website using TypeScript and React.
Demonstrated expertise in web development and UI/UX design.
